scripts.start: export BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); npm run build && netlify dev & npm run dev:cms-proxy-server
scripts.start:branch: export BRANCH=dev; npm run build ; npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:admin:config && npm run build:metalsmith
scripts.build:metalsmith: npm run build:admin:config && node metalsmith.build.js && npm run build:public
scripts.build:css: lessc --js src/less/style.less public/css/style.css  --clean-css='--s0 --advanced'  --source-map && cp -R public/css build/
scripts.build:js: uglifyjs  node_modules/@glidejs/glide/dist/glide.min.js node_modules/headroom.js/dist/headroom.min.js src/js/lib/*.js  src/js/*.js  --output public/js/scripts.js && cp -R public/js build/ && npm run build:marketing-roi-calculator:js
scripts.build:marketing-roi-calculator:js: mkdir -p public/js/marketing-roi-calculator && terser  node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.min.js src/js/marketing-roi-calculator/app.js  --output public/js/marketing-roi-calculator/app.js && cp -R public/js build/
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:metalsmith
scripts.dev:css: npm run watch:css & npm run serve
